metadata.Title: CVE-2019-20907 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Lib/tarfile.py in Python through 3.8.3, an attacker is able to craft a TAR archive leading to an infinite loop when opened by tarfile.open, because _proc_pax lacks header validation.

criterions.comment: python2.7: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
python3.5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
